de:

Sonntag, 5. Juni: Die Polynesierinnen von Saint-Sernin
Entdecken Sie die tahitische Kultur, ihr Ma'a und ihre Hƒ´mene. Begeben Sie sich auf eine Reise von den Pupillen bis zu den Geschmacksnerven.

en:
Saturday June 4: Barriq'Art the 10 years:
More than 30 artists inspired by materials from the vine (vines, stakes...), wine making (staves...) or wine (bottles, corks, cases...) for unique works. üé®
3:00 pm - Opening of the doors of the winery
3:30 pm - Opening of the exhibition in the presence of the artists
Inauguration of our fresco by the Graffeur Franck Perronnet
Live painting on barrels
16h30 - Initiation to wine tasting with Erik Filipiak, oenologist. Tasting of our wines in C√¥tes du Lot IGP, red, ros√©, white and AOP Cahors
6:30 pm - Tapas aperitif with the group "Los Gojats del Porti", traditional Basque songs until 8:30 pm

Sunday June 5 : The Polynesians of Saint-Sernin
Discover the Tahitian culture, its ma'a and its hƒ´mene. Embark on a journey from the pupils to the taste buds.
BY RESERVATION ONLY:
12:30 pm - Aperitif üç∑
1:30 p.m. - Opening of the "Tahitian oven" (traditional stewing)
On the menu:
   Starter: Polynesian marinated fish
   Main course (with a glass of wine): Ahi ma'a : Pig cooked under the ground with exotic vegetables
& Mitihue : coconut milk based sauce
   Dessert: Po'e banana, traditional dessert made with banana and coconut milk
   Vanilla coffee
Meal animated by the "Ori Heitiare Tahiti" troop Songs & dances
FREE ENTRANCE FROM 4:00 PM:
16h00 - Visit of the Barriq'Art exhibition
Graffiti on pareos
Exhibition/ Sale of Tahitian pearls OZ Tahiti
6:30 pm - Aperitif until 8:30 pm

Ticketing for the reservation of the Tahitian oven: https://www.billetweb.fr/polynesiennes
it:
Sabato 4 giugno: 10¬∞ anniversario di Barriq's Art:
Pi√π di 30 artisti si ispirano ai materiali della vite (tralci, pali?), del processo di vinificazione (doghe?) o del vino (bottiglie, tappi, casse?) per realizzare opere uniche. ?

18.30 - Aperitivo a base di tapas con il gruppo "Los Gojats del Porti", canzoni tradizionali basche fino alle 20.30

Domenica 5 giugno: I polinesiani di Saint-Sernin
Scoprite la cultura tahitiana, la sua ma'a e il suo h?mene. Intraprendete un viaggio dalle pupille alle papille gustative.

Nel menu:
   Antipasto: pesce marinato alla polinesiana
   Piatto principale (con un bicchiere di vino): Ahi ma'a : Maiale cotto sotto terra con verdure esotiche
& Mitihue: salsa al latte di cocco
   Dessert: Po'e banana, dessert tradizionale a base di banana e latte di cocco
   Caff√® alla vaniglia
Pasto animato dalla troupe "Ori Heitiare Tahiti" Canti e danze
INGRESSO LIBERO DALLE 16.00:

18.30 - Aperitivo fino alle 20.30

Biglietteria per la prenotazione del forno tahitiano: https://www.billetweb.fr/polynesiennes

Zaterdag 4 juni: Barriq's Art 10e verjaardag:
Meer dan 30 kunstenaars laten zich voor unieke werken inspireren door materialen van de wijnstok (wijnstokken, stokken...), het vinificatieproces (duigen...) of wijn (flessen, kurken, kisten...). üé®
